@description.name: @description
@description.body: Global notification handler that routes messages topic-dependent to different {@link cv.core.notifications.IHandler} (e.g. NotificationCenter, Dialog, Toast, console.log, native notification, internal message bus …)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Register an action handler for an action type. Note: There can only be one action handler per type. If there is currently another handler registered for this type it will be replaced.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Unregister an action handler for an action type.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get an instance of the registered action handler for the requested action type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: config {Map?} additional parameters that should be passed to the action handlers constructor
@param.description: additional parameters that should be passed to the action handlers constructor

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates an action element for the given action type. Unsually this is a button or a similar DOMElement with a listener attached.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: config {Map} additional parameters that should be passed to the action handlers constructor
@param.description: additional parameters that should be passed to the action handlers constructor
